text: [Music]
hi my name is re and I am 8 years old
and this is the story of the time I flew
by myself I was only five I had been on
planes lots of times with my mom or dad
but I was nervous that I would sit next
to someone I didn't know and what if I
got hungry or thirsty and they didn't
give me food when I got to the airport
my dad had to sign all this stuff and
there was this Airline lady who gave me
a name tag that said my name on it so
everyone knew who I was I was the first
one on the plane so I got really good
seats with my own TV and the airline
lady took me to meet the pilots it was
cool the pilots told me all this cool
stuff about airplanes and flying and
they said I earned my wings and gave me
a special pen just like the pilots wore
everyone on the plane kept coming over
to make sure I was okay and that I had
my seat belt fast for lunch I got a
special hamburger just for a kids with
carrot sticks and a cookie no one else
on the entire plane got a
hamburger when we landed I had to stay
on the plane until the airline Landy
could take me to my mom she made my mom
prove she was my mom even though I just
said hi Mom now I like to fly all by
myself as long as I get my special
hamburger well that's my
story you just watched a TTI on Disney
Channel
